Desc.entry: Offers care and support and encourages all members of society, including ex-offenders, to access training. Offers training programmes for all participants who need extra support due to literacy/numeracy difficulties, offender issues, lack of confidence, health problems, home and personal problems and any other problems they need support with. Offers a variety of Government training schemes. Training areas available are information and technology, mechanics, graphic design, catering, literacy, numeracy and key skills. Also offers Army preparation programme.

ContactName.entry: Mrs E Lamb, Area Manager/Robert Furniss, Centre Manager
